import{INFO_DIALOG}from"./initialState";export var INFO_DIALOG_OPEN="INFO_DIALOG_OPEN";export var INFO_DIALOG_CLOSE="INFO_DIALOG_CLOSE";export var INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS="INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS";export var INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS_OBJECT="INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS_OBJECT";export var INFO_DIALOG_RESET="INFO_DIALOG_RESET";//To open Info Dialog
export var openInfoDialog=function openInfoDialog(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INFO_DIALOG_OPEN});};};//To close Info Dialog
export var closeInfoDialog=function closeInfoDialog(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INFO_DIALOG_CLOSE});dispatch(resetInfoDialog());};};//To open Info Dialog with options
export var openInfoDialogWithOptions=function openInfoDialogWithOptions(){var displayType=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;var title=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"Info Dialog";var text=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"Default text for Info Dialog";var heading=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:null;var image=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:null;return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS,payload:{open:true,displayType:displayType,title:title,text:text,heading:heading,image:image}});};};//To open Info Dialog with options object
export var openInfoDialogWithOptionsObject=function openInfoDialogWithOptionsObject(){var optionsObject=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INFO_DIALOG_OPEN_WITH_OPTIONS_OBJECT,payload:!!optionsObject?optionsObject:{}});};};//To reset Info Dialog
export var resetInfoDialog=function resetInfoDialog(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INFO_DIALOG_RESET,payload:INFO_DIALOG.UISettings});};};
